channel.title: Talks By Dwan J. Young
channel.description: General Conference talks by Dwan J. Young.

image.title: General Conference talks by Dwan J. Young.

item.title: An Invitation to Grow
item.description: The following addresses were delivered at the General Women’s Meeting held Saturday evening, March 27, in the Tabernacle, Salt Lake City. Latter-day Saint women twelve and older gathered to view the locally televised broadcast; the program was also v

item.title: Prepare to Teach His Children
item.description: Tonight I want to tell you about a girl who was a pianist of some promise. When she was quite small, her mother sat with her on the piano bench each day, taught her the notes, and encouraged her to practice while she learned those first pieces.

item.title: Keeping the Covenants We Make at Baptism
item.description: In July my husband and I went to Philmont, the Scout training center in New Mexico. Gathered there were 150 priesthood leaders and their families in that beautiful camp where the plain meets the soaring, pine-covered mountains.

item.title: Draw Near to Him in Prayer
item.description: Thank you, girls, for that beautiful song. The words you have just sung remind me of a prayer—and singing hymns is one way for us to pray, one way for us to draw near to our Heavenly Father.

item.title: The Light of Hope
item.description: The scriptures tell us to abound in hope. Like an early morning sunrise or a happy child’s face, we all want our lives to be touched with light—because darkness has no power against the light.

item.title: Teach Children the Gospel
item.description: Holly loved the towering pine tree in front of her home. Its branches shaded her favorite place to play.
